item.title: Publications
item.description: A selection of my recent publications, for the complete list visit my CV or schoolar. Recent publications (2021) Park B, Larivière S, Rodriguez-Cruces R, Royer J, Tavakol S, Wang Y, et al. (2021). Topographic divergence of atypical cortical asymmetry and atrophy patterns in temporal lobe epilepsy; Brain.
